name: You Da One(Gregor Salto Amsterdam Club)
content: You the one that I dream about all day
你就是我梦寐以求的人
You the one that I think about always
你就是我日夜期盼的人
You are the one so I make sure I behave
你就是让我注意言行的人
我的爱因有你而闪亮 你的爱因为我多彩
